root.name: Airlock
root.description: OverviewÂ Airlock is a game for the Atari 2600 which involves escaping from a submarine which is slowly taking on water and sinking. In order to escape from the flooding submarine two keys on every floor must be collected. Once the two keys have been collected the next floor may be accessed. There are also Torpedoes which will fly back and forth, and if hit by the torpedoes, time will be lost and the floor may potentially flood before the next floor is available.
